author: Bernard Shaw
message: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
title: Thought of the day

author: Richard Bach
message: To bring anything into your life, imagine that it's already there.
title: Thought of the day

author: German proverb
message: Begin to weave and God will give you the thread.
title: Thought of the day

author: Confucius
message: The more you know yourself, the more you forgive yourself.
title: Thought of the day
